contents.text: Thank you for calling TrendMedia in San Francisco, a marketing agency with over fifteen years of experience building outstanding websites.
To learn about our website design and development services, press 1.
To request a quote for a new website, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a website consultation specialist.

navigationGoals: Obtain a quote for building a new company website quickly.
Request a quote for a new website to showcase my veteran-owned small business
I’d like to get a quote for a custom responsive website with headless CMS integration.
I’d like a price quote and a clear overview of what your new website package includes.
I’d like a cost estimate and to discuss specifications for a brand-new website project.

contents.text: To discuss redesigning your existing website, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our redesign team.

navigationGoals: Discuss redesign options for my existing website.
Discuss redesigning my existing site for the nonprofit I run supporting fellow veterans
I’m calling to explore redesigning my existing website with improved UI/UX using modern frameworks.
I need help modernizing my existing website and discussing a full redesign.
I’m looking to revamp my existing website and explore redesign options.

contents.text: To explore our digital marketing and brand strategy offerings, press 2.
To speak with our social media advertising experts, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our social media advertising team.

navigationGoals: Connect with someone about running social media ad campaigns.
Speak with social media advertising experts to boost outreach for my veteran support group
I want to discuss setting up and optimizing a social media ad campaign with detailed performance analytics.
I want assistance setting up and managing social media advertising for my business.
I want to plan a social media advertising campaign and understand your rates.

contents.text: To speak with our SEO and content marketing specialists, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our SEO and content marketing team.

navigationGoals: Get expert advice on boosting our SEO and content marketing.
Connect with SEO and content marketing specialists to improve visibility of my veteran assistance blog
I’d like to arrange a technical SEO audit and develop a content marketing strategy to boost organic traffic.
I’m looking for help improving my search engine rankings and developing a content strategy.
I need guidance on enhancing my site’s SEO and developing a content marketing strategy.
